word:
God's instruction is not Yea and Nay, but Yea and Amen in Christ Jesus; and his workers are 


                      - 42 - 

called upon to remember that they cannot drift along with unsettled principles which are warped and distorted by impulse, without misrepresenting the truth which they profess, and doing a lasting injury to their own souls. 
      .      .      .       .      .      . 
                             Mrs. E. G. White. 
                                                                -
